data.comment: The first-half is under way at Kehrweg Stadium - Mouscron kick-off to start the match.
The first-half is under way at Kehrweg Stadium - Mouscron kick-off to start the match.
Goal! Olivier Verdon gives Mouscron a 0-1 lead.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Smail Prevljak.
The second-half is underway. Eupen with the kick-off.
Zakaria Atteri is on a sub for Jonah Osabutey for Mouscron.
Babacar Dione is replacing Fabrice Olinga for Mouscron at Kehrweg Stadium.
Nils Schouterden (Eupen) gets a yellow card.
Knowledge Musona scores to make it 2-1 at Kehrweg Stadium.
Eupen's Smail Prevljak has been booked in Eupen.
Bernd Hollerbach is making the team's third substitution at Kehrweg Stadium with Dylan Seys replacing Marko Bakic.
Eupen make their first substitution with Konan N'Dri replacing Knowledge Musona.
Benat San Jose Gil (Eupen) is making a second substitution, with Saeid Ezatollahi replacing Omid Ebrahimi.
The home team have replaced Nils Schouterden with Jon Bautista. This is the third substitution made today by Benat San Jose Gil.
At Kehrweg Stadium, Jon Bautista has been yellow-carded for the home team.
